item.title: RECAP - The Weekly Challenge - 208
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. STAR CONTRIBUTORS 03. CONTRIBUTION STATS 04. GUESTS 05. LANGUAGES 06. CENTURION CLUB 07. DAMIAN CONWAY’s CORNER 08. ANDREW SHITOV’s CORNER 09. PERL SOLUTIONS 10. RAKU SOLUTIONS 11. PERL & RAKU SOLUTIONS HEADLINES Thank you Team PWC for your continuous support and encouragement. STAR CONTRIBUTORS Following members shared solutions to both tasks in Perl and Raku as well as blogged about it.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 209
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Special Bit Characters 10. TASK #2: Merge Account HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #209 of The Weekly Challenge. We have new guest Simon Dueck joined Team PWC and shared solutions to Week #207 and Week #208 in F#. E. Alvarez blog post sharing Javascript magic once again.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 208
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Minimum Index Sum 10. TASK #2: Duplicate and Missing HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #208 of The Weekly Challenge. Please do accept my apology for the late release of the weekly challenge. Thank you for your kind messages. It means a lot. Did you notice, we now have over 10,000+ solutions in Perl?

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 207
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Keyboard Word 10. TASK #2: H-Index HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #207 of The Weekly Challenge. E. Alvarez blog post for you to keep you engaged. First Monday of the month and time to declare next champion. With great pleasure, I announce Solathian as our next champion.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 206
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Shortest Time 10. TASK #2: Array Pairings HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #206 of The Weekly Challenge. We have one more addition to the Team PWC, an experience Perl hacker by the name Avery Adams. Thanks for sharing solutions in Perl. E. Alvarez is back to blogging again and we have another gem from him.

item.title: The Weekly Challenge - 205
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS 01. HEADLINES 02. SPONSOR 03. RECAP 04. PERL REVIEW 05. RAKU REVIEW 06. CHART 07. NEW MEMBERS 08. GUESTS 09. TASK #1: Third Highest 10. TASK #2: Maximum XOR HEADLINES Welcome to the Week #205 of The Weekly Challenge. Last week, we had 2 new members joinging the Team PWC and both are Perl hackers (Matthias Muth and Tyler Bird). Matthias even shared blog post with solutions in Perl.
